creator: stelio@skyrove.com
text:
Apache crashes when performing a postgres vacuum while server load is over 6.

[alert] (EAI 2)Name or service not known: mod_unique_id: unable to find IPv4 address of "xxx.yyy.co.za"

When apache has crashed i'm unable to resolve xxx.yyy.co.za from the same server.

I can not disable the module as it's a dependency for mod_security.

creator: poirier@pobox.com
text: mod_unique_id relies on being able to find out the IP address of the server, so you need to either fix your name resolution to be reliable, or stop using mod_unique_id.
